name: v1_aircraft
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool aircraft_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Detailed technical specs on over 1000 airplane models. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/aircraft
API description: API Ninjas Aircraft API endpoint. Returns a list of aircrafts that match the given parameters. This API only supports airplanes - for helicopter specs please use our Helicopter API.

At least one of the following parameters (excluding the limit parameter) must be set.

min_height.description: Minimum height of the aircraft in feet.

min_wingspan.description: Minimum wingspan of the aircraft in feet.

limit.description: How many results to return. Must be between 1 and 30. Default is 1.

max_height.description: Maximum height of the aircraft in feet.

max_length.description: Maximum length of the aircraft in feet.

min_length.description: Minimum length of the aircraft in feet.

max_range.description: Maximum range of the aircraft in nautical miles.

min_range.description: Minimum range of the aircraft in nautical miles.

max_speed.description: Maximum max. air speed in knots.

max_wingspan.description: Maximum wingspan of the aircraft in feet.

engine_type.description: Type of engine. Must be one of: piston, propjet, jet.

min_speed.description: Minimum max. air speed in knots.

manufacturer.description: Company that designed and built the aircraft. Defaults to 'Gulfstream'.
